EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Annual Review
Good Morning
This is a final reminder.
Licence Record {!Partner_Addendum__c.Licence__c} has a Partner Addendum due to expire.
If this PA is not extended by the end of month it will be ceased.
Click here to view Partner Addendum.
Regards
